Title: Relates to enacting Eric's ID Law
Summary: Provides for the placement of a discreet nonapparent disability designation on non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits; makes technical and conforming changes.
LawCode: Amd §§490, 502 & 504, V & T L; amd §840, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the executive law, in relation to the placement of a discreet nonapparent disability designation on non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits and making technical and conforming changes
